name: 2021 6th International Conference on Material Engineering and Smart Materials
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted and registered papers of ICMESM 2021 will be published in ICMSN 2021 Conference Proceedings as a special chapter, which will be indexed by SCOPUS, Ei Compendex (CPX), Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc.
